item.description: On January 4, 2012 ...Highly ranked UCONN Women's Basketball Lady Huskies team will be hosting the West Virginia squad at the XL Center in downtown Hartford, CT. I have managed to pull a few strings and got discounted ($10) tickets to this televised event - CPTV. I would love for many Ron Paul supporters to join me at the game to wave signs prior to game time 6pm-7pm, and inside, during the game itself, and pass out our super brochures/DVD's/bumper stickers to all that accept them....during halftime, we can canvass around civic center, and pass out info, inform the masses, and hopefully recruit some new supporters.... UCONN is one of the best ladies college basketball teams in the country, and usually draws 8K-16K fans to each home game....This is a great way to gain exposure for Ron Paul, and watch some entertaining basketball as well...Hope you all can join me. I need RSVP right away, as I must secure these discounted tickets by the end of THIS week (Friday: December 16, 2011 deadline) I need a head count ASAP (I will purchase tickets in advance, pay later)...Please make this happen, or at least think of donating $10, so I can invite others to join us, or hand out to potential Ron Paul voters.... This event is one day after the Iowa Primary, and Ron Paul's name will be buzzing the news outlets when he takes 1st Place in the Iowa Caucuses ....Let's send a message to CT voters that we got Connecticut covered as well :-) Thank you....Doug Weidl....call me to confirm interest in a ticket (860) 899-4818.
item.name: UCONN Women's Basketball game / Sign & Banner Wave and Flyer Handout Event
